name: Vegetarian Cheeseburger Pizza
author: Juliana Hale
summary: Use your favorite plant-based burger patties in this vegetarian pizza. Make it completely vegan by using egg-free mayo and dairy-free Cheddar cheese-style shreds.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package shredded Colby-Monterey Jack cheese
1 tablespoon prepared yellow mustard, or to taste
¼ cup shredded lettuce, or to taste
¼ cup diced tomatoes, or to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C)
Whisk together mayonnaise, ketchup, and hot sauce in a small bowl
Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat
Crumble burger patties into the skillet
Add onion; cook, stirring to break up patties, until crumbles are browned and onion is tender, 4 to 5 minutes
Roll dough to a 12-inch circle on a lightly floured surface, allowing dough to rest as necessary
Transfer to the prepared pizza pan, building up edges
Bake crust in the preheated oven for 8 minutes
Remove from the oven and spread mayonnaise mixture over crust
Top with burger mixture and remaining cheese
Bake until crust is brown and cheese is melted, about 15 minutes
Top with pickles and drizzle with mustard
